header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.subtitle: Answers for researchers, educators, and South Korean partners.

faqs.question: How accurate are the timelines?
faqs.answer: Each divergence is peer reviewed by at least two historians and a regional expert. We cite primary sources in our internal CMS and follow the Korean Fair Labeling and Advertising Act when describing hypothetical outcomes.

faqs.question: Do you collect personal data?
faqs.answer: No, we do not collect or store any personal data. All your progress is stored locally on your device.

faqs.question: Can educators reuse the material?
faqs.answer: Yes. Our classroom packets are released under a Creative Commons BY-NC license. When distributing in South Korea, please include our company registration number as required by the Electronic Commerce Act.

faqs.question: How do you handle takedown requests?
faqs.answer: Requests citing defamation, copyright, or National Security Law concerns can be submitted via the Support page. We respond within 72 hours in accordance with the Korean Communications Standards Commission guidelines.
